Description_lang: Your healing spells and abilities have the chance imbue your target with Shining Radiance for 15s.If the target is an enemy, up to 5 party members within 30 yards gain Radiant Focus, increasing Critical Strike by X against the target while Shining Radiance is active. If the target is an ally, up to 5 party members within 30 yards gain Shining Stability, increasing Versatility by X while Shining Radiance is active.
